docs.lead_paragraph: A high-ranking Senate Democrat is probing retailers and online companies about sales of dubious dietary supplements, especially those promising seniors protection from memory loss, dementia and other age-related problems.

headline.main: Senator Probes Retailers on Dubious 'Brain' Supplements
headline.print_headline: Senator Probes Retailers on Dubious 'Brain' Supplements

docs.snippet: A high-ranking Senate Democrat is probing retailers and online companies about sales of dubious dietary supplements, especially those promising seniors protection from memory loss, dementia and other age-related problems.

docs.lead_paragraph: Drugmakers' plans to conduct vast clinical trials to test and hopefully validate the first Ebola vaccines have been thwarted by success in beating back the deadly epidemic in West Africa.

headline.main: Ebola Vaccines in Limbo Expose Need for More Speed in Trials
headline.print_headline: Ebola Vaccines in Limbo Expose Need for More Speed in Trials

docs.snippet: Drugmakers' plans to conduct vast clinical trials to test and hopefully validate the first Ebola vaccines have been thwarted by success in beating back the deadly epidemic in West Africa.

docs.lead_paragraph: The shift is a result of a health crisis related to a rise in heroin use in many of their home states.

headline.main: House Republicans Ease Opposition to Needle Exchanges
headline.print_headline: House Republicans Ease Their Opposition to Needle Exchanges

docs.abstract: Annual health spending bill being drawn up in House of Representatives allows state officials to use federal money to fund drug treatment programs that include needle exchanges, marked shift in Republicans' long-held opposition to idea; shift has been inspired by outbreaks of AIDS and hepatitis in conservative states closely linked to heroin and other drug abuse.
docs.snippet: The shift is a result of a health crisis related to a rise in heroin use in many of their home states.

docs.lead_paragraph: Exercise is good for you, for many reasons, but studies show consuming less food is the key to weight loss.

headline.main: To Lose Weight, Eating Less Is Far More Important Than Exercising More
headline.print_headline: Diet, Not Exercise, Is Crucial to Weight Loss

docs.abstract: The Upshot; studies show that most effective way to lose weight is to eat less, and that exercise, while beneficial, is relatively far less effective at shedding calories that people consume.
docs.snippet: Exercise is good for you, for many reasons, but studies show consuming less food is the key to weight loss.
